messages.message:
This the PR (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/57560) that updates the token from the Org one to a user one.

It works fine when I run it locally. I just tested again
```from transformers import LlamaTokenizer
tokenizer = LlamaTokenizer.from_pretrained(
          'instabase/llama2_tokenizer', use_auth_token='[REDACTED_TOKEN]')
print(tokenizer('hello world'))```
And I can see it downloads it (I briefly set it to private to verify it uses the token)
did you backport this to 24.01 and 04?
No, only to master. I didn’t know the huggingface codepath is used anywhere outside local testing.

Created and merged the backports for 24.01 and 24.04.
@Nikolaos Kofinas, we can make the repos private again in Hugging Face later today after confirming that things work.
